Content.Text: ðŸŽ„ It's time to bring the Christmas spirit to TCU - welcome to our first annual Christmas Photo Op event! ðŸŽ„

In this event, the participants will compete for the best Christmas-themed photo! 
 The event takes place on the TCU Discord as usual.

Submission rules: 
- Photo must be taken in The Crew (obviously). Mods are allowed. 
- Photo may be a raw screenshot or edited into something fun, like a Christmas greeting card! 
- Multiple submissions may be posted by one user, but each one must be sent as a separate message! 
- No low effort submissions.

The Top 4 winners will be chosen by amount of user votes after the deadline day. 
 The #1 Winner will be rewarded with a special role on the TCU Discord! 
 The winning submissions will be featured here on the TCU Website!
The deadline is 31st of December, because we're just this nice! But brownie points to those who send their submissions before the 25th!!!
If you would like to participate, then join the TCU Discord and check out the TCU Christmas Photo Op 2025 announcement post for more info!
> TCU Christmas Photo Op 2025 Announcement Post
